confirm_new_password_doesnt_match_new_pa: Please enter the same value again.
too_short_new_password_error_text: Minimum length of this field must be equal or greater than 8 symbols. Leading and trailing spaces will be ignored.
invalid_new_password_error_text: Minimum of different classes of characters in password is 3. Classes of characters: Lower Case, Upper Case, Digits, Special Characters.
